This branch moved into its new buildings in February 1974 which consist of two linked hexagons.They accommodate the children's and adult's sections in pleasant, well lit and attractive rooms off Baslow Road.7,108 borrowers are registered at the library, 1,496 of which are children. They borrow 196, 056 book annually. The library's busiest days are Mondays, Fridays and Saturdays. On Mondays and Wednesdays a nursery group meets in the children's section.
